data.name: Bramblewood
data.detailed_description:
About This Game
A sorceress is looking for a new gardener. Learn spells to grow exotic and rare plants while helping the locals save their small businesses. Unlock festivals and romance options by befriending the locals.

Characters
The first thing you will notice is that none of them are human. Sure, there are elves and fauns, and other sorts of humanoids but your basic humans don't exist in this world.

There's the sorceress who let's face it is your boss. She's a real bad ass who got the duchy of Bramblewood for helping put the current king on the throne. She's often times gone for long periods of time and trusts you to make sure everything runs smoothly in her absence.

The baker who is a real sweetheart and often asks for your help getting ingredients. She's widely known for her blueberry muffins.

There's a whole host of other characters just waiting to meet you.

Features
  • Forage and ExploreUnlike many farming games many plants can be foraged for allowing you to make the choice between forager and farmer. You can grow plants simply for their beauty if you wish.
  • Diverse Characters Befriend a naga or help out a naiad. The wide range of character's come from all walks of life baker's, candlestick makers, farmers, traveling performers, sorceresses.
  • You set the PaceExplore the valley, forage for ingredients, learn new skills, or befriend the locals. A new peaceful life is just a click away.

data.short_description: Live in a Castle, Work for a Sorceress, Save the Valley! Bramblewood is a cute magical farming sim where you learn spells to care for plants. Befriend the locals and help them save their small businesses to unlock festivals and romance options.
